div.p: Fantastic! Given the system below, select true if the system has one or more solutions and false otherwise.

Once finished the activity select true:
The correct answer is FALSE. (TO BE COMPLETED: You can add an explanation of the correct answer)

Congratulations!. You have finished the questionnaire. (TO BE COMPLETED: Add some links or document for review the contents of the topics treated in the activity). You can also add an image by substituting the name of the image below and copying it in the UoL folder.
